isis.stitle: VT 365 Diesel Engine - 2004 Model Year - HIGH-PRESSURE OIL PUMP - Installation - High-pressure Oil Pump Assembly

note.para: Do the following procedure, if the high-pressure oil pump assembly was removed or the rear cover and cylinder heads were reinstalled after maintenance.

calloutgroup.callout1: O-ring in inlet recess of the high-pressure oil pump
O-ring in recess of the branch tube assembly

step1.para: Lubricate recess in branch tube assembly.
Lubricate a new O-ring and put in branch tube recess.
Lubricate recess for high-pressure oil pump.
Lubricate a new O-ring and put in recess for high-pressure oil pump.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, use an approved seal for pump to cover. A substitution could damage the pump cover.

figure.caption: Installation of O-ring for high-pressure oil pump cover

step1.para: Install a new O-ring on the high-pressure oil pump cover recess.
If removed, attach branch tube adapter to the high-pressure oil pump and install pump.

figure.caption: Installation of mounting bolts for high-pressure oil pump

step1.para: Install three M8 x 35 socket bolts to secure the high-pressure oil pump to the crankcase. Tighten bolts to the standard torque .

figure.caption: Removal of bolts from branch tube adapter

step1.para: Install two M6 x 30 bolts to secure the branch tube adapter to the branch tube assembly and tighten to the standard torque .
